article_title: Oracle Wants No New Business From Oregon's State Government
article_text:

twitter.description:
Oracle has had enough of Oregon.
The business technology giant has decided it will no longer take on new business with the state’s government amid an ongoing legal battle, Oracle senior vice ...
twitter.title: Here’s Why Oracle Refuses New Business From Oregon’s Government

article_metadata.description: Oracle said it no longer wants new business with Oregon following a legal battle between the two parties over a failed project.

article_metadata.sailthru.description: The legal fight centers on a botched healthcare exchange website.

og.description: A botched healtcare exchange website at the heart of the matter.
og.title: Here's Why Oracle Doesn't Want New Business From The State Of Oregon
